definition: root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: The pericycle produces the latent roots and periderm.
sentences.chinese: 由中柱鞘產生側根及周皮。

sentences.english: These mutants exhibited reduced numbers of lateral roots (LRs) and partial loss of gravitropism.
sentences.chinese: 這些突變體的側根數目減少，向重性部分喪失。

sentences.english: ABA could induce SEN1 gene in Arabidopsis lateral root primordia.
sentences.chinese: ABA能誘導SEN1基因在擬南芥側根基部表達。
